      void setBody(java.lang.String body)
      This will set the Email Body template, it is used by IEmailTemplateSource to put the body template into the descriptor for the search results.

      This will set the email filename
      void setLocale(ILocale locale)
      This will set the email locale, it is used by IEmailTemplateSource to set the locale where this template was found.

      • setLocale

        void setLocale(ILocale locale)

        Parameters:
        locale - the locale

      • isHtml

        boolean isHtml()
        This will return true if this document is to be treated as html. This is determined by the file name extension, html or htm
        Returns:
        true if html

      • getContentPrompt

        java.lang.String getContentPrompt()
        If not empty, this is a string to be prompted for additional content.
        Returns:
        a string or display.properties key value

      • setContentPrompt

        void setContentPrompt(java.lang.String value)
        This will set the prompted for additional content. Note that this will be passed to gw.api.domain.DisplayKey#getDisplayKeyValue(java.lang.String) to resolve this as a display key. If not a display key will display the content.
        Parameters:
        value - a string or display.properties key value
